formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'DUNDIRESULT' =-
[Syntax] DUNDIRESULT(id|resultnum)
[Synopsis] Retrieve results from a DUNDIQUERY
[Description] This function will retrieve results from a previous use of the DUNDIQUERY function. id - This argument is the identifier returned by the DUNDIQUERY function. resultnum - This is the number of the result that you want to retrieve. Results start at 1. If this argument is specified as "getnum", then it will return the total number of results that are available.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
